entries.name: new(corpus)
entries.desc: initialize with an array of words to be matched against

entries.name: similar_word_list(word, limit = 3)
entries.desc: return the result of 'similar_words', concatenated into a list (eg “a, b, or c”)

entries.name: similar_words(word, limit = 3)
entries.desc: return an array of words similar to 'word' from the corpus
